document.full_text: a study commissioned by u.s. roman catholic bishops concludes that neither the all-male celibate priesthood nor homosexuality caused the church's sexual abuse crisis, the new york times reported on tuesday.
document.title: bishops cite '60s turmoil in sex abuse scandal: report
lines_and_colors: a study commissioned by u.s. roman catholic bishops concludes that neither the all-male celibate priesthood nor homosexuality caused the church's sexual abuse crisis, the new york times reported on tuesday.
